data.title: Notes on Aphodius coenobita Gravenhorst, 1807, a forgotten name (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Aphodiinae)
data.text:
Anonymous (1842) Necrolog [Ahrens]. Entomologische Zeitung, Stettin, 3 (2), 45–48.
